title: Medical miscellany
author: Bedersi, Jedaiah ben Abraham
description: Contents: Ff. 6v-9v blank. Fragment of a medical treatise (ff. 10r-53r). Medical notes and a medical chapter by later hands (ff. 53v-56v). Ff. 57-59 blank. Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi's Igeret Beḥinat ha-ʻOlam (ff. 60-81). Calendar by Yitsḥaḳ ben Yeḥiʼel ha-Leṿi (ff. 82v-85v). Calendrical notes in various hands (ff. 86-98).
